articles.content: Astrophysicists have discovered why spiral galaxies like the Milky Way are rare in the Supergalactic Plane, a dense region in our Local Universe. The research, led by Durham University and the Univer… [+5408 chars]

articles.title: Scientists have 20-minute "conversation" with a humpback whale named Twain - Earth.com
articles.description: In an unprecedented encounter, a research team successfully engaged in a "conversation" with a humpback whale named Twain.
articles.content:
In an unprecedented encounter, a research team successfully engaged in a “conversation” with a humpback whale named Twain.
